commitResults.messageBody: Change AB3 references to TAilor, add commands from draft

commitResults.messageTitle: Add myself in AboutUs.md and PPP

commitResults.messageBody: [DOC] edit PPP, edit Neel's part in AboutUS.md \n\n PPP: Added in some things I did for the team in the PPP. Also fixed Neel's links in AboutUs.md

The leftover Address class from AB3 was not needed. Let's repurpose it
into a Mod class to indicate the module that a person is taking.

Also changed the test cases accordingly.

commitResults.messageTitle: [REFAC] Fix styling issues, especially for imports
commitResults.messageBody: Fix styling issue that arose from changing Address into Mod.

Same as previous commit, fix styling related to changing address into
mod.

commitResults.messageTitle: [BUG] Fix refactor causing changes in docs
commitResults.messageBody:
The previous refactor caused a change of "address" in the documentation.
This reverts them back to the appropriate naming, ie "seedu.address"
instead of "seedu.mod", and "contact list" instead of "mod book" or
"address book".

commitResults.messageTitle: [REFAC BUG] Fix checkstyle for refactoring address
[REFAC BUG] Fix styling issues after refactoring
commitResults.messageBody: after refactoring address.

Previous refactor broke some test cases as they were hard coded to use
certain addresses. Manually changed them to proper modules to fit.

# [ FEAT BUG CHG REFAC PERF DATA TOOL COPY DOC SPEC WIP ]
# Do not exceed above line in commit txt length
# Example:
# [DOC] Add docs for Count Command in UG
# ------------------------------------------------

# ----------------------------------------------------------------------
# Description of why, not how.
# Link to issue, if needed.
# wrap desc. text at the end of the above line, do not exceed line
# length
#
# Example:
# There was a need to count the number of students in a given class.
# Hence we implemented the count command in a previous commit, and now
# this is to update the UG to incorporate it.
# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
# FEAT - feature ,new stuff to the site
# BUG - any bug fix you put in place
# CHG - change that is NOT a refactor or a COPY change
# REFAC - refactors existing code but does not change functionality
# PERF -  effects the performance of the application, ie: adding sidekiq or where-exists
# DATA -  only effects the data directly, ie: add to or remove from the seed file
# TOOL - does not directly effect site users, developer or testing space, ex: pry or rubocop
# COPY - only text changes
# DOC - changes to documentation
# SPEC - any test or spec changes
# WIP- work in progress. USE SPARINGLY

commitResults.messageTitle: [FEAT] Extend find functionality beyond just names
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, the find function/command only worked for names, ie
> find alex bernice
Let's change this so that it works for all possible details/fields of a
person, with the format using the prefixes defined. Example:
> find n/alex bernice
> find n/alex bernice e/example.com
> find n/alex bernice t/friends e/example.com

commitResults.messageTitle: [DOC] Change docs for extended find comand
commitResults.messageBody: This has not taken into account of Address -> Mod yet

For find command, Mod class, UG, link PRs, standardised commitm message
format.

commitResults.messageTitle: [REFAC DOC BUG] Fixed naming of address
commitResults.messageBody:
Fixed it into mod or (address book into) contact list accordingly.

These bugs occured because of previous refactoring

commitResults.messageTitle: [REFAC SPEC] Change Address into Mod, add tests
commitResults.messageBody:
Changed Address into Mod, as per previous merge.

Also added tests for predicates.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update contents of README to match project. Add acknowledgement to original source code
Update README.md to refer to correct image
Fix grammatical errors Add links to improve navigability

commitResults.messageBody:
Renamed setAccelerator method to setMenuAccelerator. The current
setAccelerator method signature only allows for setting accelerators
to menu shortcuts. We intend to set accelerators for other
functionalities such as refilling the previous command. By renaming this
method, we avoid vagueness in our setAccelerator methods.

commitResults.messageTitle: Revert "[REFAC] Rename accelerator method for specificity"
commitResults.messageBody:
This reverts commit 79413437102021e06dcaa3d33d0b433212cc5689.

commitResults.messageTitle: [FEAT] Add up keypress support to commandbox
commitResults.messageBody:
The up key press event will be the event to trigger the filling of the
previous command. Adding such functionality now will make it easier to
test the behaviour of the up keypress event while coding out its
functionality.

commitResults.messageTitle: [REFAC] Update line seperators Github checks for line seperators to be /n instead of /r/n. Line seperators for affected files have been refactored

commitResults.messageBody:
[DOC] update details such as names, images and URL links

As part of appropriate documentation, let's update fields with team members' latest information
[WIP][DOC] create the broad structure of the PPP with the addition of minimal content. To be updated over time
remove trailing whitespaces and add a newline at EOF for kxshxsh.md

commitResults.messageTitle: add use cases to the DG

commitResults.messageBody: group parameter's prefix is g/ to facilitate grouping students into tutorial groups within the same module and taught under the same tutor.
mod has the ability to have the user set a default group value. This prevents the user from entering the same information again and again.

commitResults.messageTitle: [CHG] allow to update previous default group value with a new one.
commitResults.messageBody: ensure that a detailed success message is outputted which displays both the previous and the newly updated group title.

commitResults.messageTitle: make sure default value is added to the person details, if been set for the mod
add details about self to about us
add user stories to the developer guide
refactor commons and logic packages to suit tailor
fix null pointers for obtaining formatted output and bulk object append sequence
finish code refactoring for the ui, storage, and model packages
[FEAT] implement the mail functionality for index based person reference
[FEAT] add bulk mail functionality in the form of mailall
fix checkstyle errors and json eof newlines
fix errors to pass all the test cases
add skeletal PPP and update AboutUs.md
[BUG] fix groups not being visible in ui
